citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process from 1:11pm-2:00pm
on 21-APR-21.
I attempted to contact the license by calling the contact number and by sending a message via the business Facebook
page.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process from 1:11pm-2:00pm 
on 21-APR-21. 
 
I attempted to contact the license by calling the contact number and by sending a message via the business Facebook 
page. 
 
 
 
End Section
